plants.name: Tulsi
plants.notes: Water in the morning. Avoid waterlogging.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.notes: Let soil dry completely between watering.

plants.name: Money Plant
plants.notes: Keep soil slightly moist. No direct sun.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.notes: Very low maintenance. Avoid overwatering.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.notes: Mist leaves occasionally. Keep moist but not soggy.

plants.name: Spider Plant
plants.notes: Water when the top inch of soil is dry.

plants.name: Rose
plants.notes: Requires rich soil and regular watering.

plants.name: Marigold
plants.notes: Well-drained soil is best. Avoid overhead watering.

plants.name: Lavender
plants.notes: Avoid humidity. Needs well-draining soil.

plants.name: Mint
plants.notes: Keep soil moist. Spreads quickly.

plants.name: Neem
plants.notes: Drought-tolerant once mature. Water moderately.

plants.name: Curry Leaf
plants.notes: Needs warm climate and regular watering.

plants.name: Pothos
plants.notes: Easy to grow indoors. Avoid soggy soil.

plants.name: Bamboo Palm
plants.notes: Likes humid air. Mist often indoors.

plants.name: Jasmine
plants.notes: Water regularly during bloom season.

plants.name: Lemon Tree
plants.notes: Needs well-draining soil. Do not overwater.

plants.name: Chili Plant
plants.notes: Water at base; avoid wetting leaves.

plants.name: Coriander
plants.notes: Needs consistent moisture for good growth.

plants.name: Spinach
plants.notes: Prefers cooler temperatures. Keep soil moist.

plants.name: Fenugreek
plants.notes: Water daily in hot weather. Fast-growing.

plants.name: Mustard Greens
plants.notes: Keep soil evenly moist for tender leaves.

plants.name: Bitter Gourd
plants.notes: Needs trellis support. Loves warm, moist conditions.

plants.name: Bottle Gourd
plants.notes: Grows best in fertile, moist soil. Provide vine support.

plants.name: Cabbage
plants.notes: Requires consistent watering. Keep soil firm.

plants.name: Cauliflower
plants.notes: Needs cool weather. Avoid water on curds.

plants.name: Carrot
plants.notes: Deep watering promotes root growth. Avoid overwatering.

plants.name: Beetroot
plants.notes: Requires moist, loose soil. Avoid water stagnation.

plants.name: Onion
plants.notes: Less water during bulb formation. Well-drained soil preferred.

plants.name: Garlic
plants.notes: Stop watering 2 weeks before harvest. Avoid soggy soil.

plants.name: Brinjal
plants.notes: Needs rich, moist soil. Remove weeds regularly.

plants.name: Pumpkin
plants.notes: Loves deep watering. Needs space to spread.

plants.name: Radish
plants.notes: Quick growing. Keep soil moist but not soggy.

plants.name: Turnip
plants.notes: Best in cool weather. Loamy, well-drained soil preferred.

plants.name: Peas
plants.notes: Keep soil evenly moist. Avoid wetting foliage.

plants.name: Lady Finger
plants.notes: Loves warm weather. Requires regular watering during flowering.

plants.name: Capsicum
plants.notes: Requires consistent watering and rich soil.

plants.name: Cucumber
plants.notes: Requires frequent watering. Trellis helps fruit stay clean.

plants.name: Watermelon
plants.notes: Heavy water needs until fruit ripens, then reduce watering.

plants.name: Muskmelon
plants.notes: Likes warm, moist soil. Reduce watering during ripening.

plants.name: Strawberry
plants.notes: Mulch soil to retain moisture and keep berries clean.

plants.name: Guava
plants.notes: Requires less water once mature. Avoid water stagnation.

plants.name: Papaya
plants.notes: Needs well-draining soil. Sensitive to overwatering.

plants.name: Banana
plants.notes: Loves moisture. Mulch well around base.

plants.name: Pomegranate
plants.notes: Drought-tolerant once established. Deep watering preferred.

plants.name: Mango
plants.notes: Water young trees regularly. Avoid watering when flowering.

plants.name: Jackfruit
plants.notes: Water young trees frequently. Mulch to retain moisture.

plants.name: Litchi
plants.notes: Needs humid conditions. Avoid dry spells during flowering.

plants.name: Sapota
plants.notes: Water well during fruiting season.

plants.name: Custard Apple
plants.notes: Avoid overwatering. Needs warm, dry climate for fruit set.

plants.name: Jamun
plants.notes: Drought-tolerant. Water more in summer.
